healthy_leaves.description: Leaves are green, firm, and free from visible disease symptoms.
healthy_leaves.impact: No negative impact on plant growth or yield.
healthy_leaves.remedy: Maintain proper irrigation, nutrition, and regular monitoring.

bud_root_dropping.description: Dropping or decay of buds and roots, often caused by fungal or bacterial infection.
bud_root_dropping.impact: Severely affects plant stability and nutrient uptake, may lead to plant death.
bud_root_dropping.remedy: Improve drainage, remove infected plants, apply appropriate fungicide or bactericide.

bud_rot.description: Rotting of the central bud caused by pathogens, usually in humid or waterlogged conditions.
bud_rot.impact: Stops new leaf growth and can kill the plant if untreated.
bud_rot.remedy: Remove affected tissue, apply systemic fungicide, avoid water accumulation in the crown.

caterpillars.description: Leaf damage caused by caterpillar feeding, including holes and chewed edges.
caterpillars.impact: Reduces leaf area and photosynthesis, weakens plant.
caterpillars.remedy: Hand-pick caterpillars, use biological control or approved insecticides.

drying_of_leaflets.description: Leaflets appear dry and brittle, often due to water stress or disease.
drying_of_leaflets.impact: Reduced photosynthesis and overall plant vigor.
drying_of_leaflets.remedy: Ensure adequate watering, improve soil moisture retention, treat underlying disease.

flaccidity.description: Leaves appear limp and droopy due to loss of turgor pressure.
flaccidity.impact: Indicates water stress or root damage, leading to reduced growth.
flaccidity.remedy: Correct irrigation issues, check root health, improve soil aeration.

gray_leaf_spot.description: Gray or brown spots on leaves caused by fungal infection.
gray_leaf_spot.impact: Decreases photosynthetic efficiency and may cause premature leaf drop.
gray_leaf_spot.remedy: Remove infected leaves, apply fungicide, reduce leaf wetness.

leaf_rot.description: Decay of leaf tissue, often starting at the base or edges.
leaf_rot.impact: Weakens plant and can spread rapidly in humid conditions.
leaf_rot.remedy: Prune affected leaves, improve airflow, apply fungicide.

leaflets.description: General abnormalities or damage observed on leaflets.
leaflets.impact: May reduce photosynthesis depending on severity.
leaflets.remedy: Identify specific cause (nutrient, pest, or disease) and treat accordingly.

yellowing.description: Yellow discoloration of leaves caused by nutrient deficiency, stress, or disease.
yellowing.remedy: Apply balanced fertilizer, check soil pH, ensure proper drainage.
